page.title: 10ST PAUL'S CHURCH BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: There are three churches in our area. We interviewed the vicar of{St Paul's about them.On a Sunday morning{St {Paul's }has a congregration of about a 100. All ages come from toddlers to old people.The parish goes from the river Taw to the Leisure Centre up to Ellerslie Road,in the other way it goes from Anchor Wood just behind Grange Av,to the lodge near the crematorium.The parish is made up of Tawstock,Fremington and Barnstaple. There are two other churches in our area the Methodist church and the Christian Science on Bickington Road. {St Paul's}has been here for 30 years and was built in 1955. There have been 5 vicars the first was Father Sadler who died a while ago.In{St {Paul's}they call Father Paul a vicar whereas in a Methodist church he is known as a minister.
